meta.reasoning: Successfully completed dashboard column alignment fixes. Identified and resolved root cause: explicit height constraints on cards were preventing them from expanding to fill column space. Removed .frame(height:) from Budget Overview card, allowing it to use .frame(maxHeight: .infinity) with internal Spacer to naturally fill available space. All three columns now have uniform heights with proper alignment. Build succeeded, changes committed and pushed.
